tool_description: This tool generates a heightmap based on provided geographical coordinates (latitude and longitude). The heightmap is represented as a black and white PNG image, where the brightest pixel indicates the highest elevation.

api_list.name: get heightmap from two geopoints
api_list.description: This API allows users to input two geographical points (latitude and longitude) and returns a heightmap image (PNG) that represents the elevation within the specified borders.

required_parameters.name: lng0
required_parameters.description: The longitude of the first point.

required_parameters.name: lng1
required_parameters.description: The longitude of the second point.

required_parameters.name: lat1
required_parameters.description: The latitude of the first point.

required_parameters.name: lat0
required_parameters.description: The latitude of the second point.
